scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross in the center. He is shown with a halo and a crown of thorns, his body bearing wounds. To the left, a blue cloth is draped. In the foreground, a figure in an orange robe and blue boots stands facing away, while a child in a blue tunic and red hat stands between them. Behind Christ, a group of soldiers with helmets and spears are visible, some with their faces turned towards the viewer. The setting is an outdoor landscape with a grassy hill and trees in the background.
